00047     doc.setDocOptions(CNFamilialReporterFamilial::getDefaultDocOptions());

00098 /**
00099  * @brief Run the analysis.
00100  */
00101 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::run()
00102 {
00103     if (m_pEngine == NULL) {return;}
00104     AffxString famFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("familial-file");
00105     AffxString strOutDirName = m_pEngine->getOpt("out-dir");
00106     AffxString strFileName = Fs::join(strOutDirName,famFileName);
00107     Verbose::out(1, "Writing familial-file: " + strFileName);
00108 
00109     affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData data;
00110     setupHeader(strFileName, data);
00111 
00112     // write the file.
00113     affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* writer = new affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter(&data.Header());
00114     writer->WriteHeader();
00115     writeDataGroupAndDataSetHeaders(writer);
00116     writeDataSetData(writer);
00117 
00118     delete writer;
00119 
00120     // Convert from calvin to text format?
00121     if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("text-output"))
00122     {
00123         CalvinToText converter;
00124         converter.run(strFileName, strFileName + ".txt", true, true, true);
00125     }
00126 }
00127 
00128 /**
00129  * @brief Setup the file header in memory before writing if out
00130  * @param const AffxString& - The file name
00131  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& - The object to load the data into
00132  */
00133 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::setupHeader(const AffxString& strFileName, affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& data)
00134 {
00135     addParentHeaders(data);
00136     data.Header().SetFilename(strFileName);
00137     data.Header().AddDataGroupHdr(affymetrix_calvin_io::DataGroupHeader(L"Familial"));
00138     //data.Header().AddDataGroupHdr(affymetrix_calvin_io::DataGroupHeader(L"Segments"));
00139 
00140     // Setup the header.
00141     affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader* pHeader = data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00142     pHeader->SetFileCreationTime(DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString());
00143     addStandardHeader(pHeader, m_pEngine);
00144     ///@todo add in headers
00145     //addPgOptions(pHeader, m_pEngine->getOptions(), "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-");
00146     //addPgOptions(pHeader, m_pEngine->getStates(), "affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-");
00147     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)CNFamilialAnalysisMethod::getParams().size()); iIndex++)
00148     {
00149         pHeader->AddNameValParam(CNFamilialAnalysisMethod::getParams().at(iIndex));
00150     }
00151 
00152     // set up the data set headers.
00153     int iGroupIndex = 0;
00154     //JPB: setupDataSetHeaderSamples() and setupDataSetHeaderPaternityTesting() may end up inside the for loop
00155     setupDataSetHeaderSamples(data, iGroupIndex);
00156     setupDataSetHeaderPaternityTesting(data, iGroupIndex);
00157     setupDataSetHeaderMIE(data, iGroupIndex);
00158     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_pvMethods->size()); iIndex++)
00159     {
00160         CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod = m_pvMethods->at(iIndex);
00161         if (pMethod->isFamilialAnalysis())  {continue;}
00162         else if (pMethod->isSegmentOverlapAnalysis()) {setupDataSetHeaderSegmentOverlaps(data, pMethod, iGroupIndex);}
00163         else if (pMethod->isSegmentTypeAnalysis()) {continue;}
00164         else {throw(Except("CNFamilialReporterFamilial::run(...) Unknown CNFamilialAnalysisMethod: " + pMethod->getName()));}
00165     }
00166     iGroupIndex++;
00167     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_pvMethods->size()); iIndex++)
00168     {
00169         CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod = m_pvMethods->at(iIndex);
00170         if (pMethod->isFamilialAnalysis())  {continue;}
00171         else if (pMethod->isSegmentOverlapAnalysis()) {continue;}
00172         else if (pMethod->isSegmentTypeAnalysis()) {setupDataSetHeaderSegments(data, pMethod, iGroupIndex);}
00173         else {throw(Except("CNFamilialReporterFamilial::run(...) Unknown CNFamilialAnalysisMethod: " + pMethod->getName()));}
00174     }
00175 }
00176 
00177 /**
00178  * @brief Add parent file header to the header for this file
00179  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& - The object to load the data into
00180  */
00181 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::addParentHeaders(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& data)
00182 {
00183     CNCychp& cychpIndex = getCychpIndex();
00184     CNCychp& cychpMother = getCychpMother();
00185     CNCychp& cychpFather = getCychpFather();
00186 
00187     // Copy over headers from the cychp files.
00188     try
00189     {
00190         affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData genericData;
00191         if (cychpIndex.getFileName() != "")
00192         {
00193             affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileReader reader;
00194             reader.SetFilename(cychpIndex.getFileName().c_str());
00195             reader.Open(genericData);
00196             data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddParent(*genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr());
00197             genericData.Clear();
00198         }
00199         if (cychpMother.getFileName() != "")
00200         {
00201             affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileReader reader;
00202             reader.SetFilename(cychpMother.getFileName().c_str());
00203             reader.Open(genericData);
00204             data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddParent(*genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr());
00205             genericData.Clear();
00206         }
00207         if (cychpFather.getFileName() != "")
00208         {
00209             affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileReader reader;
00210             reader.SetFilename(cychpFather.getFileName().c_str());
00211             reader.Open(genericData);
00212             data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddParent(*genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr());
00213             genericData.Clear();
00214         }
00215     } catch(...) {Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: Load parent header failed.");}
00216 
00217 }

00219 /**
00220  * @brief Add the standard file header information
00221  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader* - The header to load
00222  * @param BaseEngine* - The engine to get parameter information from
00223  */
00224 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::addStandardHeader(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader* pHeader, BaseEngine* pEngine)
00225 {
00226     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00227 
00228     pHeader->SetFileTypeId("affymetrix-multi-data-type-analysis");
00229 
00230     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-algorithm-param-file-name");
00231     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(Fs::basename(m_pEngine->getXMLParameterFileName())));
00232     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00233 
00234     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-algorithm-param-file-guid");
00235     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(m_pEngine->getXMLParameterFileGuid()));
00236     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00237 
00238     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-algorithm-name");
00239     param.SetValueText(L"CYTO2");
00240     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00241 
00242     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-algorithm-version");
00243     param.SetValueText(L"1.0.0");
00244     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00245 
00246     param.SetName(L"program-name");
00247     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(pEngine->getOpt("program-name")));
00248     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00249 
00250     param.SetName(L"program-version");
00251     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(pEngine->getOpt("program-version")));
00252     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00253 
00254     param.SetName(L"program-company");
00255     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("Affymetrix"));
00256     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00257 
00258     param.SetName(L"create-date");
00259     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(Util::getTimeStamp()));
00260     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00261 
00262     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-algorithm-param-file-name");
00263     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(Fs::basename(pEngine->getXMLParameterFileName())));
00264     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00265 
00266     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-algorithm-param-file-guid");
00267     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(pEngine->getXMLParameterFileGuid()));
00268     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00269 
00270     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-algorithm-param-familial-file-version");
00271     param.SetValueInt32(2);
00272     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00273 }
00274 
00275 /**
00276  * @brief Dump the specified PgOptions into the header
00277  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader* - The header to load
00278  * @param PgOptions& - The options to dump
00279  * @param const AffxString& - The prefix to use when naming the options
00280  */
00281 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::addPgOptions(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader* pHeader, PgOptions& opt, const AffxString& strPrefix)
00282 {
00283     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00284     for(int i=0; i< opt.m_option_vec.size(); i++) {
00285         if ((int)opt.m_option_vec[i]->m_values.size() > 1)
00286         {
00287             for(int j=0; j< opt.m_option_vec[i]->m_values.size(); j++)
00288             {
00289                 loadParam(strPrefix + opt.m_option_vec[i]->m_longName + "-" + ::getInt(j+1), opt.m_option_vec[i]->m_type, opt.m_option_vec[i]->m_values[j], param);
00290                 pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00291             }
00292         }
00293         else
00294         {
00295             loadParam(strPrefix + opt.m_option_vec[i]->m_longName, opt.m_option_vec[i]->m_type, opt.m_option_vec[i]->getValue(), param);
00296             pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00297         }
00298     }
00299 }
00300 
00301 /**
00302  * @brief Load a parameter from it's components
00303  * @param const AffxString& - The name of the parameter
00304  * @param PgOpt::PgOptType - The type of the parameter
00305  * @param const AffxString& - The value of the parameter
00306  * @param affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType& - The parameter to load
00307  */
00308 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::loadParam(const AffxString& strName, PgOpt::PgOptType type, const AffxString& strValue, affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType& param)
00309 {
00310     param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(strName));
00311     switch(type)
00312     {
00313     case PgOpt::BOOL_OPT: param.SetValueInt8(((strValue == "true") ? (char)1 : (char)0)); break;
00314     case PgOpt::DOUBLE_OPT: param.SetValueFloat((float)::getDouble(strValue)); break;
00315     case PgOpt::INT_OPT: param.SetValueInt32(::getInt(strValue)); break;
00316     case PgOpt::STRING_OPT:
00317         if ((strName.indexOf("command-line") != -1) || (strName.indexOf("analysis") != -1) || (strName.indexOf("program-cvs-id") != -1) || (strName.indexOf("version-to-report") != -1) || (strName.endsWith("-dir")))
00318         {
00319             param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(strValue));
00320         }
00321         else
00322         {
00323             param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(Fs::basename(strValue)));
00324         }
00325         break;
00326     default: throw(Except("Cannot find PgOpt type for: " + strName));
00327     }
00328 }
00329 
00330 /**
00331  * @brief Setup the Samples data set
00332  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& - The object to load the data into
00333  * @param int - The group index
00334  */
00335 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::setupDataSetHeaderSamples(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& data, int iGroupIndex)
00336 {
00337     CNCychp& cychpMother = getCychpMother();
00338     CNCychp& cychpFather = getCychpFather();
00339 
00340     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetHeader dsHeader;
00341     if ((cychpMother.getFileName() != "") && (cychpFather.getFileName() != ""))
00342     {
00343         dsHeader.SetRowCnt(3);
00344     }
00345     else
00346     {
00347         dsHeader.SetRowCnt(2);
00348     }
00349     dsHeader.SetName(L"Samples");
00350     dsHeader.AddUIntColumn(L"SampleKey");
00351     dsHeader.AddUnicodeColumn(L"CHPFilename", 256);
00352     dsHeader.AddAsciiColumn(L"CHPID", 55);
00353     dsHeader.AddAsciiColumn(L"Role", 21);
00354     data.Header().GetDataGroup(iGroupIndex).AddDataSetHdr(dsHeader);
00355 }

00357 /**
00358  * @brief Setup the PaternityTesting data set
00359  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& - The object to load the data into
00360  * @param int - The group index
00361  */
00362 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::setupDataSetHeaderPaternityTesting(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& data, int iGroupIndex)
00363 {
00364     CNCychp& cychpMother = getCychpMother();
00365     CNCychp& cychpFather = getCychpFather();
00366 
00367     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetHeader dsHeader;
00368     if ((cychpMother.getFileName() != "") && (cychpFather.getFileName() != ""))
00369     {
00370         dsHeader.SetRowCnt(3);
00371     }
00372     else
00373     {
00374         dsHeader.SetRowCnt(1);
00375     }
00376     dsHeader.SetName(L"PaternityTesting");
00377     dsHeader.AddUByteColumn(L"AnalysisType");
00378     dsHeader.AddUIntColumn(L"ReferenceSampleKey");
00379     dsHeader.AddUIntColumn(L"FamilialSampleKey");
00380     dsHeader.AddUByteColumn(L"RoleValidity");
00381     dsHeader.AddFloatColumn(L"RoleIndexScore");
00382     data.Header().GetDataGroup(iGroupIndex).AddDataSetHdr(dsHeader);
00383 }

00385 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::setupDataSetHeaderMIE(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& data, int iGroupIndex)
00386 {
00387     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetHeader dsHeader;
00388     dsHeader.SetRowCnt(23);     // # autosomes + X chromosome
00389 
00390     dsHeader.SetName(L"MIE");
00391     dsHeader.AddUByteColumn(L"Chromosome");
00392     dsHeader.AddAsciiColumn(L"Display", 4);
00393     dsHeader.AddUIntColumn(L"MarkerCount");
00394     dsHeader.AddIntColumn(L"MIE-Trio");
00395     dsHeader.AddIntColumn(L"MIE-Mat");
00396     dsHeader.AddIntColumn(L"MIE-Pat");
00397     data.Header().GetDataGroup(iGroupIndex).AddDataSetHdr(dsHeader);
00398 }

00400 /**
00401  * @brief Setup the Segment Overlaps data set
00402  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& - The object to load the data into
00403  * @param CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* - The analysis method to load data from
00404  * @param int - The group index
00405  */
00406 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::setupDataSetHeaderSegmentOverlaps(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& data, CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod, int iGroupIndex)
00407 {
00408     if (pMethod == NULL) {return;}
00409     int iSegmentCount = ((pMethod == NULL) ? 0 : pMethod->getSegmentOverlapCount());
00410     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetHeader dsHeader;
00411     dsHeader.SetRowCnt(iSegmentCount);
00412     dsHeader.SetName(L"SegmentOverlaps");
00413     dsHeader.AddAsciiColumn(L"SegmentType", 21);
00414     dsHeader.AddUIntColumn(L"ReferenceSampleKey");
00415     dsHeader.AddAsciiColumn(L"ReferenceSegmentID", 55);
00416     dsHeader.AddUIntColumn(L"FamilialSampleKey");
00417     dsHeader.AddAsciiColumn(L"FamilialSegmentID", 55);
00418     data.Header().GetDataGroup(iGroupIndex).AddDataSetHdr(dsHeader);
00419 }

00421 /**
00422  * @brief Setup the Segments data set
00423  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& - The object to load the data into
00424  * @param CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* - The analysis method to load data from
00425  * @param int - The group index
00426  */
00427 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::setupDataSetHeaderSegments(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& data, CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod, int iGroupIndex)
00428 {
00429     if (pMethod == NULL) {return;}
00430     int iSegmentCount = ((pMethod == NULL) ? 0 : pMethod->getSegmentCount());
00431     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetHeader dsHeader;
00432     dsHeader.SetRowCnt(iSegmentCount);
00433     dsHeader.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(pMethod->getSegmentTypeString()));
00434     dsHeader.AddAsciiColumn(L"SegmentID", 55);
00435     dsHeader.AddUIntColumn(L"ReferenceSampleKey");
00436     dsHeader.AddUIntColumn(L"FamilialSampleKey");
00437     dsHeader.AddUByteColumn(L"Chromosome");
00438     dsHeader.AddUIntColumn(L"StartPosition");
00439     dsHeader.AddUIntColumn(L"StopPosition");
00440     dsHeader.AddUByteColumn(L"Call");
00441     dsHeader.AddFloatColumn(L"Confidence");
00442     dsHeader.AddIntColumn(L"MarkerCount");
00443     dsHeader.AddFloatColumn(L"Homozygosity");
00444     dsHeader.AddFloatColumn(L"Heterozygosity");
00445     data.Header().GetDataGroup(iGroupIndex).AddDataSetHdr(dsHeader);
00446 }

00448 /**
00449  * @brief Write the data group and data set headers
00450  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* - The generic calvin file writer
00451  * @return int - The offset to the samples data set
00452  */
00453 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::writeDataGroupAndDataSetHeaders(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* writer)
00454 {
00455     int iGroupIndex = 0;
00456     int iSetIndex = 0;
00457 
00458     // write out the familial analysis header
00459     writer->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).WriteHeader();
00460 
00461     // write out the segement overlap analysis header
00462     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_pvMethods->size()); iIndex++)
00463     {
00464         CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod = m_pvMethods->at(iIndex);
00465         if (pMethod->isFamilialAnalysis())
00466         {
00467             pMethod->setDataSetOffsetVec(setupDataSet(writer, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex));
00468             iSetIndex++;
00469             pMethod->setDataSetOffsetVec(setupDataSet(writer, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex));
00470             iSetIndex++;
00471             pMethod->setDataSetOffsetVec(setupDataSet(writer, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex));
00472             iSetIndex++;
00473         }
00474         else if (pMethod->isSegmentOverlapAnalysis())
00475         {
00476             pMethod->setDataSetOffsetVec(setupDataSet(writer, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex));
00477             iSetIndex++;
00478         }
00479         else if (pMethod->isSegmentTypeAnalysis())  {continue;}
00480         else {throw(Except("CNFamilialReporterFamilial::run(...) Unknown CNFamilialAnalysisMethod: " + pMethod->getName()));}
00481     }
00482 
00483     // write out the segment type analysis header
00484     //iGroupIndex++;
00485     //iSetIndex = 0;
00486     //writer->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).WriteHeader();
00487     //for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_pvMethods->size()); iIndex++)
00488     //{
00489     //    CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod = m_pvMethods->at(iIndex);
00490     //    if (pMethod->isFamilialAnalysis())  {continue;}
00491     //    else if (pMethod->isSegmentOverlapAnalysis()) {continue;}
00492     //    else if (pMethod->isSegmentTypeAnalysis())
00493     //    {
00494     //        pMethod->setDataSetOffset(setupDataSet(writer, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex));
00495     //        iSetIndex++;
00496     //    }
00497     //    else {throw(Except("CNFamilialReporterFamilial::run(...) Unknown CNFamilialAnalysisMethod: " + pMethod->getName()));}
00498     //}
00499     //return iFamilialOffset;
00500 }
00501 
00502 /**
00503  * @brief Setup the data set
00504  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* - The generic calvin file writer
00505  * @param int - The group index
00506  * @param int - The set index
00507  * @return int - The offset to the data set
00508  */
00509 int CNFamilialReporterFamilial::setupDataSet(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* writer, int iGroupIndex, int iSetIndex)
00510 {
00511     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetWriter& setWriter = writer->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).GetDataSetWriter(iSetIndex);
00512     setWriter.WriteHeader();
00513     int iOffset = writer->GetFilePos();
00514     writer->SeekFromCurrentPos(setWriter.GetDataSetSize() + 1);
00515     setWriter.UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00516     writer->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).UpdateNextDataGroupPos();
00517     return iOffset;
00518 }
00519 
00520 /**
00521  * @brief Write the data set data
00522  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* - The generic calvin file writer
00523  * @param int - The offset to the Samples data set
00524  */
00525 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::writeDataSetData(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* writer)
00526 {
00527     int iGroupIndex = 0;
00528     int iSetIndex = 0;
00529 
00530     // write out the familial and segment overlap analysis data
00531     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_pvMethods->size()); iIndex++)
00532     {
00533         CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod = m_pvMethods->at(iIndex);
00534         if (pMethod->isFamilialAnalysis())
00535         {
00536             writeDataSetSamples(writer, pMethod, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex);
00537             iSetIndex++;
00538             writeDataSetPaternityTesting(writer, pMethod, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex);
00539             iSetIndex++;
00540             writeDataSetMIE(writer, pMethod, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex);
00541             iSetIndex++;
00542         }
00543         else if (pMethod->isSegmentOverlapAnalysis())
00544         {
00545             writeDataSetSegmentOverlaps(writer, pMethod, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex);
00546             iSetIndex++;
00547         }
00548         else if (pMethod->isSegmentTypeAnalysis())  {continue;}
00549         else {throw(Except("CNFamilialReporterFamilial::run(...) Unknown CNFamilialAnalysisMethod: " + pMethod->getName()));}
00550     }
00551 
00552     // write out the segment type analysis data
00553     iGroupIndex++;
00554     iSetIndex = 0;
00555     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_pvMethods->size()); iIndex++)
00556     {
00557         CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod = m_pvMethods->at(iIndex);
00558         if (pMethod->isFamilialAnalysis())  {continue;}
00559         else if (pMethod->isSegmentOverlapAnalysis()) {continue;}
00560         else if (pMethod->isSegmentTypeAnalysis())
00561         {
00562             writeDataSetSegments(writer, pMethod, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex);
00563             iSetIndex++;
00564         }
00565         else {throw(Except("CNFamilialReporterFamilial::run(...) Unknown CNFamilialAnalysisMethod: " + pMethod->getName()));}
00566     }
00567 }
00568 
00569 /**
00570  * @brief Write the Samples data set data
00571  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* - The generic calvin file writer
00572  * @param CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* - The analysis method to load data from
00573  * @param int - The group index
00574  * @param int - The set index
00575  */
00576 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::writeDataSetSamples(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* writer, CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod, int iGroupIndex, int iSetIndex)
00577 {
00578     CNCychp& cychpIndex = getCychpIndex();
00579     CNCychp& cychpMother = getCychpMother();
00580     CNCychp& cychpFather = getCychpFather();
00581 
00582     writer->SeekFromBeginPos(pMethod->getDataSetOffsetVec().at(iSetIndex));
00583     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetWriter& setWriter = writer->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).GetDataSetWriter(iSetIndex);
00584     setWriter.Write(0);
00585     setWriter.Write(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(Fs::basename(cychpIndex.getFileName())), 256);
00586     setWriter.Write(cychpIndex.getCychpHeader().getChpID(), 55);
00587     setWriter.Write(cychpIndex.getFamilialType(), 21);
00588 
00589     if (cychpMother.getFileName() != "")
00590     {
00591         setWriter.Write(1);
00592         setWriter.Write(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(Fs::basename(cychpMother.getFileName())), 256);
00593         setWriter.Write(cychpMother.getCychpHeader().getChpID(), 55);
00594         setWriter.Write(cychpMother.getFamilialType(), 21);
00595     }
00596 
00597     if (cychpFather.getFileName() != "")
00598     {
00599         setWriter.Write(2);
00600         setWriter.Write(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(Fs::basename(cychpFather.getFileName())), 256);
00601         setWriter.Write(cychpFather.getCychpHeader().getChpID(), 55);
00602         setWriter.Write(cychpFather.getFamilialType(), 21);
00603     }
00604 }
00605 
00606 /**
00607  * @brief Write the PaternityTesting data set data
00608  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* - The generic calvin file writer
00609  * @param CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* - The analysis method to load data from
00610  * @param int - The group index
00611  * @param int - The set index
00612  */
00613 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::writeDataSetPaternityTesting(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* writer, CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod, int iGroupIndex, int iSetIndex)
00614 {
00615     CNCychp& cychpMother = getCychpMother();
00616     CNCychp& cychpFather = getCychpFather();
00617 
00618     writer->SeekFromBeginPos(pMethod->getDataSetOffsetVec().at(iSetIndex));
00619     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetWriter& setWriter = writer->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).GetDataSetWriter(iSetIndex);
00620 
00621     if (cychpMother.getFileName() != "" && cychpFather.getFileName() != "")
00622     {
00623         setWriter.Write((unsigned char)0);    // paternity with maternity assumed
00624         setWriter.Write(0);                   // child sample ID
00625         setWriter.Write(2);                   // father sample ID
00626         setWriter.Write((unsigned char)cychpFather.getFamilialCall());
00627         setWriter.Write((float)cychpFather.getFamilialConfidence());
00628     }
00629 
00630     if (cychpMother.getFileName() != "")
00631     {
00632         setWriter.Write((unsigned char)1);    // maternity
00633         setWriter.Write(0);                   // child sample ID
00634         setWriter.Write(1);                   // mother sample ID
00635         setWriter.Write((unsigned char)cychpMother.getFamilialCall());
00636         setWriter.Write((float)cychpMother.getFamilialConfidence());
00637     }
00638 
00639     if (cychpFather.getFileName() != "")
00640     {
00641         setWriter.Write((unsigned char)2);    // paternity
00642         setWriter.Write(0);                   // child sample ID
00643         setWriter.Write(2);                   // father sample ID
00644         setWriter.Write((unsigned char)cychpFather.getFamilialDuoCall());
00645         setWriter.Write((float)cychpFather.getFamilialDuoConfidence());
00646     }
00647 }
00648 
00649 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::writeDataSetMIE(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* writer, CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod, int iGroupIndex, int iSetIndex)
00650 {
00651     const int iXChromosome = m_pEngine->getOptInt("xChromosome");
00652     const int iYChromosome = m_pEngine->getOptInt("yChromosome");
00653     const int lastAutosome = 22;
00654 
00655     CNCychp& cychpMother = getCychpMother();
00656     CNCychp& cychpFather = getCychpFather();
00657     const bool motherPresent = cychpMother.getFileName() != "";
00658     const bool fatherPresent = cychpFather.getFileName() != "";
00659 
00660     writer->SeekFromBeginPos(pMethod->getDataSetOffsetVec().at(iSetIndex));
00661     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetWriter& setWriter = writer->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).GetDataSetWriter(iSetIndex);
00662 
00663     std::vector<unsigned char> vChromosomes;
00664 
00665     // copy all keys of CNCychp::m_mMarkerCount to vChromosomes
00666     std::transform(
00667                 CNCychp::m_mMarkerCount.begin(),
00668                 CNCychp::m_mMarkerCount.end(), 
00669                 std::back_inserter(vChromosomes),
00670                 affxstl::select1st<std::map<unsigned char, unsigned int>::value_type>()
00671                 );
00672 
00673     std::sort(vChromosomes.begin(), vChromosomes.end());
00674 
00675     for (unsigned char chr = 1; chr < iYChromosome; chr++)
00676     {
00677         if (chr > lastAutosome && chr < iXChromosome) {
00678             continue;
00679         }
00680         AffxString displayStr;
00681         if (chr == iXChromosome) {
00682             displayStr = "  X";
00683         } else {
00684             displayStr = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(StringUtils::ToString(chr, 4, L' '));
00685         }
00686         if (std::binary_search(vChromosomes.begin(), vChromosomes.end(), chr))
00687         {
00688             // data available
00689             setWriter.Write(chr);                               // chromosome number
00690             setWriter.Write(displayStr, 4);                     // chromosome number as string
00691             setWriter.Write(CNCychp::m_mMarkerCount[chr]);      // number of genotypeable markers
00692             if (motherPresent && fatherPresent)
00693             {
00694                 setWriter.Write(CNCychp::m_mMIE_Trio[chr]);         // MIE-Trio
00695                 setWriter.Write(CNCychp::m_mMIE_Mat[chr]);          // MIE-Mat
00696                 setWriter.Write(CNCychp::m_mMIE_Pat[chr]);          // MIE-Pat
00697             }
00698             else if (motherPresent)
00699             {
00700                 setWriter.Write(-1);                                // MIE-Trio
00701                 setWriter.Write(CNCychp::m_mMIE_Mat[chr]);          // MIE-Mat
00702                 setWriter.Write(-1);                                // MIE-Pat
00703             }
00704             else if (fatherPresent)
00705             {
00706                 setWriter.Write(-1);                                // MIE-Trio
00707                 setWriter.Write(-1);                                // MIE-Mat
00708                 setWriter.Write(CNCychp::m_mMIE_Pat[chr]);          // MIE-Pat
00709             }
00710         }
00711         else {
00712             // data not available
00713             setWriter.Write(chr);                               // chromosome number
00714             setWriter.Write(displayStr, 4);                     // chromosome number as string
00715             setWriter.Write(0);                                 // number of genotypeable markers
00716             setWriter.Write(-1);                                // MIE-Trio
00717             setWriter.Write(-1);                                // MIE-Mat
00718             setWriter.Write(-1);                                // MIE-Pat
00719         }
00720     }
00721 }
00722 
00723 /**
00724  * @brief Write the SegmentOverlaps data set data
00725  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* - The generic calvin file writer
00726  * @param CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* - The method to get the data from
00727  * @param int - The group index
00728  * @param int - The set index
00729  */
00730 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::writeDataSetSegmentOverlaps(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* writer, CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod, int iGroupIndex, int iSetIndex)
00731 {
00732     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetWriter& setWriter = writer->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).GetDataSetWriter(iSetIndex);
00733     if (pMethod != NULL)
00734     {
00735         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(pMethod->getDataSetOffsetVec().at(iSetIndex));
00736         for (int i = 0; (i < pMethod->getSegmentOverlaps().getCount()); i++)
00737         {
00738             CNSegmentOverlap* p = pMethod->getSegmentOverlaps().getAt(i);
00739             setWriter.Write(p->SegmentType, 21);
00740             setWriter.Write(p->ReferenceSampleKey);
00741             setWriter.Write(p->ReferenceSegmentID, 55);
00742             setWriter.Write(p->FamilialSampleKey);
00743             setWriter.Write(p->FamilialSegmentID, 55);
00744         }
00745     }
00746 }
00747 
00748 /**
00749  * @brief Write the Segments data set data
00750  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* - The generic calvin file writer
00751  * @param CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* - The method to get the data from
00752  * @param int - The group index
00753  * @param int - The set index
00754  */
00755 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::writeDataSetSegments(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* writer, CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod, int iGroupIndex, int iSetIndex)
00756 {
00757     if (pMethod != NULL)
00758     {
00759         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(pMethod->getDataSetOffsetVec().at(iSetIndex));
00760         for (int i = 0; (i < pMethod->getIndexSegments().getCount()); i++)
00761         {
00762             CNSegment* p = pMethod->getIndexSegments().getAt(i);
00763             writeStandardSegment(writer, p, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex);
00764         }
00765         for (int i = 0; (i < pMethod->getMotherSegments().getCount()); i++)
00766         {
00767             CNSegment* p = pMethod->getMotherSegments().getAt(i);
00768             writeStandardSegment(writer, p, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex);
00769         }
00770         for (int i = 0; (i < pMethod->getFatherSegments().getCount()); i++)
00771         {
00772             CNSegment* p = pMethod->getFatherSegments().getAt(i);
00773             writeStandardSegment(writer, p, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex);
00774         }
00775     }
00776 }
00777 
00778 /**
00779  * @brief Write the Segments data set data
00780  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* - The generic calvin file writer
00781  * @param CNSegment* - The segment to write out
00782  * @param int - The group index
00783  * @param int - The set index
00784  */
00785 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::writeStandardSegment(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* writer, CNSegment* p, int iGroupIndex, int iSetIndex)
00786 {
00787     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetWriter& setWriter = writer->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).GetDataSetWriter(iSetIndex);
00788     setWriter.Write(p->getSegmentName(), 55);
00789     setWriter.Write(0);
00790     setWriter.Write(p->getFamilialSampleKey());
00791     setWriter.Write((unsigned char)p->getChromosome());
00792     setWriter.Write((unsigned int)p->getStartPosition());
00793     setWriter.Write((unsigned int)p->getEndPosition());
00794     setWriter.Write((unsigned char)p->getCall());
00795     setWriter.Write((float)p->getConfidence());
00796     setWriter.Write(p->getMarkerCount());
00797     setWriter.Write((float)p->getHomozygosity());
00798     setWriter.Write((float)p->getHeterozygosity());
00799 }
